title: Can not resize my split screen on pixel 4XL
content:
When I launch two apps in split screen mode on my Pixel 4XL, I can move the dividing bar when my phone is in portrait orientation. If I change the screen orientation to landscape, I cannot move the divider from the middle position. When I try to move the divider to one side, it moves but as soon as I let go, it reverts to the middle position.
Have others noticed this effect?
Thanks
